On Oct. 6, 2023. the decedent was involved in a rollover motor vehicle accident and taken to Christus St. Michael Hospital. On Oct. 7, 2023, the decedent was transferred to UAMS in Little Rock. The decedent was pronounced deceased on Oct 8 at 1940.
